AT.name: Rodea the Sky Soldier
AT.description: Als Rodea - ein humanoider, fliegender Roboter, der auch "Himmelskrieger" genannt wird - steigst du in diesem aufregenden Third-Person Action-Adventure-Spiel für die Nintendo 3DS™ in den Himmel auf und verteidigst Garuda, das Land im Himmel, gegen die mechanischen Kräfte des Kaiserreiches Naga! Vor 1000 Jahren versuchte das irdische Kaiserreich Naga, den schwebenden Kontinent Garuda einzunehmen, um seine natürlichen Ressourcen zu erbeuten. Aber dank Rodea, der das Versprechen gab, Garuda zu beschützen, scheiterte die Invasion und Nagas Zivilisation war dem Untergang geweiht. In der Gegenwart entdeckt Ion, eine lebhafte junge Erfinderin, Rodeas Überreste. Sie repariert diese prompt und reaktiviert so den ehemaligen Himmelskrieger. Als das Kaiserreich Naga, das für ausgestorben gehalten wurde, seine vor 1000 Jahren begonnene Invasion fortsetzt, muss Rodea erneut fliehen, um sein Versprechen, Garuda zu beschützen, zu halten!

AU.name: Rodea the Sky Soldier
AU.description: Take to the skies and defend Garuda, the Sky Kingdom against the mechanized forces of the Naga Empire as Rodea, a humanoid flying robot known as a “sky soldier,” in this exciting third-person action-adventure game for the Nintendo 3DS™! 1,000 years ago, the terrestrial Naga Empire attempted to invade the floating continent of Garuda for its natural resources. But thanks to Rodea, who swore a promise to protect Garuda, their invasion was unsuccessful and Naga’s civilization fell into decline. In present day, Rodea’s remains are discovered by a spirited young inventor named Ion, who promptly repairs and reactivates the former sky soldier. Though they were believed to have gone extinct, when the Naga Empire resumes the invasion it started 1,000 years ago, Rodea must once again take flight to keep the promise he made to defend Garuda!

BG.name: Rodea the Sky Soldier
BG.description: Take to the skies and defend Garuda, the Sky Kingdom against the mechanized forces of the Naga Empire as Rodea, a humanoid flying robot known as a “sky soldier,” in this exciting third-person action-adventure game for the Nintendo 3DS™! 1,000 years ago, the terrestrial Naga Empire attempted to invade the floating continent of Garuda for its natural resources. But thanks to Rodea, who swore a promise to protect Garuda, their invasion was unsuccessful and Naga’s civilization fell into decline. In present day, Rodea’s remains are discovered by a spirited young inventor named Ion, who promptly repairs and reactivates the former sky soldier. Though they were believed to have gone extinct, when the Naga Empire resumes the invasion it started 1,000 years ago, Rodea must take flight to keep the promise he made to defend Garuda once again!

BE.name: Rodea the Sky Soldier
BE.description: Partez explorer le ciel et défendre Garuda, le continent céleste contre les forces mécaniques de l'empire Naga avec Rodea, un robot volant connu sous le nom de « soldat du ciel », dans cet incroyable jeu d'action-aventure jouable sur la Nintendo 3DS™! Il y a 1000 ans, l'empire terrestre Naga essaya d'envahir le continent flottant de Garuda pour ses ressources naturelles. Cependant, grâce à Rodea, qui avait promis de protéger Garuda, l'invasion échoua et la civilisation de Naga tomba en déchéance. De nos jours, les restes de Rodea sont découverts par une jeune et vive inventrice dénommée Ion qui répare rapidement et réactive l'ancien soldat du ciel. Alors que l'empire Naga que l'on croyait éteint reprend l'invasion commencée 1000 ans plus tôt, Rodea doit à nouveau s'envoler pour rester fidèle à la promesse qu'il a faite de défendre Garuda !

Though they were believed to have gone extinct, when the Naga Empire resumes the invasion it started 1,000 years ago, Rodea must take flight to keep the promise he made to defend Garuda once again!

ES.name: Rodea the Sky Soldier
ES.description: ¡Lánzate al cielo y conviértete en Rodea, un robot humanoide volador conocido como "el soldado de los cielos" para defender Garuda, the Sky Kingdom, de las fuerzas mecanizadas del Naga Empire en este emocionante juego de acción y aventuras en tercera persona para la Nintendo 3DS™! 1000 años atrás, el Naga Empire terrestre trató de invadir el continente flotante Garuda para hacerse con sus recursos naturales. Pero, gracias a Rodea, que prometió proteger Garuda, sus planes de invasión fallaron y la civilización de Naga entró en declive. En el presente, un joven y apasionado inventor llamado Ion descubrió los restos de Rodea y arregló y reactivó al antiguo soldado de los cielos. El Naga Empire, que se creía extinto, continúa con la invasión que inició hace 1000 años... ¡Así que Rodea deberá volver a alzar el vuelo para cumplir con su promesa de defender Garuda!

FI.name: Rodea the Sky Soldier
FI.description: Take to the skies and defend Garuda, the Sky Kingdom against the mechanized forces of the Naga Empire as Rodea, a humanoid flying robot known as a “sky soldier,” in this exciting third-person action-adventure game for the Nintendo 3DS™! 1,000 years ago, the terrestrial Naga Empire attempted to invade the floating continent of Garuda for its natural resources. IT.name: Rodea the Sky Soldier
IT.description: Spicca il volo e difendi Garuda, il regno celeste (the Sky Kingdom), contro le forze meccaniche del Naga Empire. In questo emozionante gioco d'azione e avventura in terza persona per Nintendo 3DS™ sarai Rodea, un robot umanoide volante noto come "soldato celeste"! Un migliaio di anni fa, il Naga Empire dalla Terra cercò di invadere il continente volante di Garuda per saccheggiarne le risorse naturali. Rodea giurò fedeltà e protezione a Garuda e grazie a lui l'invasione fu sventata, portando al declino la civiltà di Naga. Al giorno d'oggi, un giovane e appassionato inventore chiamato Ion ritrova i resti di Rodea, li ripara e riattiva il vecchio soldato celeste. Sebbene creduto estinto da mille anni, il Naga Empire torna all'attacco e così Rodea deve tornare in volo, pronto come sempre a difendere Garuda!

LT.name: Rodea the Sky Soldier
LT.description: Take to the skies and defend Garuda, the Sky Kingdom against the mechanized forces of the Naga Empire as Rodea, a humanoid flying robot known as a “sky soldier,” in this exciting third-person action-adventure game for the Nintendo 3DS™! 1,000 years ago, the terrestrial Naga Empire attempted to invade the floating continent of Garuda for its natural resources. Though they were believed to have gone extinct, when the Naga Empire resumes the invasion it started 1,000 years ago, Rodea must take flight to keep the promise he made to defend Garuda once again!

NL.name: Rodea the Sky Soldier
NL.description: Neem aan de hemelen en te verdedigen Garuda, de Sky Koninkrijk tegen de gemechaniseerde krachten van de Naga Rijk als Rodea, een humanoïde vliegende robot bekend als een" sky soldaat, "in dit spannende third-person actie-adventure game voor de Nintendo 3DS™ ! 1000 jaar geleden, de aardse Naga keizerrijk geprobeerd om de drijvende continent Garuda binnenvallen om zijn natuurlijke hulpbronnen. Maar dankzij Rodea, die een belofte te beschermen Garuda zwoer, hun invasie was succesvol en Naga's beschaving in verval. In de huidige dag worden overblijfselen Rodea's ontdekt door een pittige jonge uitvinder genaamd Ion, die prompt reparaties en reactiveert de voormalige hemel soldaat. Hoewel ze werden verondersteld uitgestorven te zijn gegaan, toen de Naga Rijk hervat de invasie begon het 1000 jaar geleden, Rodea moet nogmaals vlucht te nemen aan de belofte die hij aan Garuda te verdedigen te houden!

NZ.name: Rodea the Sky Soldier
NZ.description: Take to the skies and defend Garuda, the Sky Kingdom against the mechanized forces of the Naga Empire as Rodea, a humanoid flying robot known as a “sky soldier,” in this exciting third-person action-adventure game for the Nintendo 3DS™! 1,000 years ago, the terrestrial Naga Empire attempted to invade the floating continent of Garuda for its natural resources. But thanks to Rodea, who swore a promise to protect Garuda, their invasion was unsuccessful and Naga’s civilization fell into decline. In present day, Rodea’s remains are discovered by a spirited young inventor named Ion, who promptly repairs and reactivates the former sky soldier. PL.description: Take to the skies and defend Garuda, the Sky Kingdom against the mechanized forces of the Naga Empire as Rodea, a humanoid flying robot known as a “sky soldier,” in this exciting third-person action-adventure game for the Nintendo 3DS™! 1,000 years ago, the terrestrial Naga Empire attempted to invade the floating continent of Garuda for its natural resources. In present day, Rodea’s remains are discovered by a spirited young inventor named Ion, who promptly repairs and reactivates the former sky soldier. Though they were believed to have gone extinct, when the Naga Empire resumes the invasion it started 1,000 years ago, Rodea must take flight to keep the promise he made to defend Garuda once again!

PT.name: Rodea the Sky Soldier
PT.description: Vá aos céus e defenda Garuda, the Sky Kingdom contra as forças mecanizadas do Naga Empire como Rodea, um robô humanoide voador conhecido como um "soldado do céu", neste excitante jogo de ação e aventura em terceira pessoa para o Nintendo 3DS™! Há 1.000 anos o Naga Empire, um império terrestre, tentou invadir o continente flutuante de Garuda para obter seus recursos naturais. Mas, graças a Rodea, que jurou uma promessa de proteger Garuda, a invasão não teve sucesso e a civilização de Naga entrou em declínio. No presente, os restos de Rodea foram descobertos por um jovem e animado inventor chamado Ion, que prontamente reparou e reativou o antigo soldado do céu. Apesar de haverem sido tomados como extintos, quando o Naga Empire der novo início à invasão iniciada 1.000 anos atrás, Rodea deverá uma vez mais voar para cumprir a promessa feita de defender Garuda!

RU.name: Rodea the Sky Soldier
RU.description: Поднимитесь в небо и защищать Гаруда, небо царство против механизированных войск Нага империи как Rodea, человекоподобного робота полета, известной как" небо солдата ", в этой захватывающей третьего лица приключенческий игры для консоли Nintendo 3DS™ ! 1000 лет назад, земная Нага Империя пыталась вторгнуться плавающий континент Гаруда своими природными ресурсами. Но благодаря Rodea, которые клялись обещание защищать Гаруда, их вторжение было неудачным, и цивилизация Нага пришла в упадок. В настоящее время останки Rodea являются обнаружен живой молодой изобретатель по имени Ион, который тут же ремонт и реактивирует бывшего небо солдат. Хотя они, как полагают, вымерли, когда Нага Империя возобновляет вторжение это началось 1000 лет назад, Rodea должны снова обратиться в бегство, чтобы держать обещание, которое он сделал, чтобы защитить Гаруда!

SE.name: Rodea the Sky Soldier
SE.description: Take to the skies and defend Garuda, the Sky Kingdom against the mechanized forces of the Naga Empire as Rodea, a humanoid flying robot known as a “sky soldier,” in this exciting third-person action-adventure game for the Nintendo 3DS™! 1,000 years ago, the terrestrial Naga Empire attempted to invade the floating continent of Garuda for its natural resources. But thanks to Rodea, who swore a promise to protect Garuda, their invasion was unsuccessful and Naga’s civilization fell into decline. SI.name: Rodea the Sky Soldier
SI.description: Take to the skies and defend Garuda, the Sky Kingdom against the mechanized forces of the Naga Empire as Rodea, a humanoid flying robot known as a “sky soldier,” in this exciting third-person action-adventure game for the Nintendo 3DS™! 1,000 years ago, the terrestrial Naga Empire attempted to invade the floating continent of Garuda for its natural resources. But thanks to Rodea, who swore a promise to protect Garuda, their invasion was unsuccessful and Naga’s civilization fell into decline. In present day, Rodea’s remains are discovered by a spirited young inventor named Ion, who promptly repairs and reactivates the former sky soldier. Though they were believed to have gone extinct, when the Naga Empire resumes the invasion it started 1,000 years ago, Rodea must take flight to keep the promise he made to defend Garuda once again!

But thanks to Rodea, who swore a promise to protect Garuda, their invasion was unsuccessful and Naga’s civilization fell into decline. In present day, Rodea’s remains are discovered by a spirited young inventor named Ion, who promptly repairs and reactivates the former sky soldier. Though they were believed to have gone extinct, when the Naga Empire resumes the invasion it started 1,000 years ago, Rodea must take flight to keep the promise he made to defend Garuda once again!
